phrases: I am going to be... the Wizard King.
I have the ability to find out
just how much magical power one has with these chains.
And you have no magic whatsoever.
You must have been born that way.
No wonder you could not get a grimoire.
To think that you lack even an ounce of magic
in this world where magic is everything.
Then no matter how hard I try, I will not be able to use magic?
To think that someone so pathetic existed.
You will not even be able to find a job, let alone become the Wizard King!
I am sure your friend, the great genius over there, mocks you, too.
Yuno's so amazing that he was chosen by the four-leaf.
You cannot do a thing in this world.
No matter how hard I try, some things just cannot be helped.
I am just going to give...
Who are you calling a loser?
Asta, it is true that you will not be able to become the Wizard King,
Even your little friend is telling you it is impossible.
That is because I am going to become the Wizard King!
This brat who has no magical power whatsoever?
Sorry you had to see me looking that pathetic, Yuno.
I am going to kick this guy's butt!
There is no way that Asta would not have been chosen!
He always has before... and he is doing it now.
I am going to become the Wizard King... and protect you and everyone else.
I am going to make everyone even happier!
So we can have even nicer things!
And then, I am going to prove to everyone...
That even if you are poor... or an orphan...
you can still become the Wizard King.
Grey words cannot make anything happen
Wishing to fly freely across the sky
I dreamed it all my life
Step by step I go, though it is a doubtful world
Do not care how much I fall
Instinct is my guide, I never give up
To faraway future, I burst out running
Go beyond even the unseen fears
The vision I had, so I can be myself
Someday I will write the next page
I was able to meet you
You are such a crybaby, Yuno.
I have got your back, Yuno!
Everyone is waiting at the top!
You are such an amazing cook!
When I grow up, will you marry me and cook for me?
It was Father who baked those.
Would you like to marry him?
You are the one I want to marry!
Sister is, um... a woman of the cloth.
I am not done yet, Yuno!
I will not give up until I am an adult, no matter what!
And then the world was covered in deep, deep darkness.
Just when the demon tried to destroy the world...
He is not going to get away with that!
The brave mage fought the demon to bring the dawn back to the world.
And finally, he defeated the demon.
The mage's light shone ever so brightly upon the whole world.
The long, long night had come to an end.
This was the dawn of our world.
And so, the mage was dubbed the Wizard King and became a legend.
And they all lived happily ever after.
The Wizard King still exists, right?
The title of Wizard King has been passed down through many generations.
All along, they have been protecting us with their magic.
It is because of the Wizard King that the Clover Kingdom is so peaceful.
Is the Wizard King really important?
He is the most important after the king.
Okay, I have made up my mind!
I am... going to be the Wizard King!
I just was not expecting that.
Well, he defeated the demon, right?
That means he is super strong!
I want to be cool, too!
If I become the Wizard King,
I will be able to make everyone even happier, right?
You will be able to wear nice clothes and eat all the good food you want!
I am going to make this crappy little church huge and amazing!
I will get you whatever you want, too, Sister!
I will look forward to it.
I am going to be the Wizard King!
That is a completely different subject.
Why is it I still cannot use magic?!
I will hang up the laundry!
Do not you start crying, too, Yuno.
I am going to be the Wizard King, after all!
Making a baby or two stop crying is a piece of cake!
I was wondering if one of you would run an errand for me.
Would someone deliver this to the mayor?
It is a very important letter, you see...
Well, it is a very important letter,
and I am hesitant to leave it in Asta's hands, so I am counting on you.
I have to go see the mayor in the next village over.
I have to ask him to spare us some food to make it through the winter.
As it stands now, we just do not have enough tatoes.
Will you be okay by yourself?
You cannot use magic, so at least do some manual labor.
Did you even dig up the tatoes you were supposed to?
I dug up the ones for today a long time ago.
It looks like it is going to get chilly tonight.
If you want to drink any more, you got to bring some cash.
You are not getting any for free!
I do not want your stupid booze anyway, you jerk!
I will have to be careful not to slip.
Please tell Father that I received it.
It is late, so be careful getting home!
Yuno's taking an awfully long time.
And Father is not back yet, either.
Let us just eat without them.
That is not fair to Yuno!
I am just going to exchange it for some cash.
Where do you get off having something this extravagant?
What do you expect to do to me with magic like that?
Who the hell are you, brat?
Do not touch me with your filthy hands!
Damn little brat just will not give up.
I told you, I have got your back.
You little wretch with no magical powers!
I am going to become the Wizard King!
I built up my muscles since I could not use any magic.
Looks like they came in handy after all.
I am going to become the Wizard King.
I am going to become the Wizard King... and protect you and everyone else.
I am going to make everyone even happier!
So we can have even nicer things!
And then, I am going to prove to everyone...
That even if you are poor... or an orphan...
you can still become the Wizard King.
Anyone can... if they work hard enough!
I will become the Wizard King, too!
I will get stronger, and protect you and everyone else!
I am going to make everyone happier!
So we can have nicer things!
It is insanely shabby, but I am going to take good care of it for the rest of my life!
I will repay you for this someday.
So you are going to become the Wizard King, too?
I thought you were just making fun of me.
I have no interest in being too friendly with my rival.
But you are the one who gave me hope.
Even if you are poor, an orphan...
We can become greater than anyone else in this world.
To make Sister and everyone else happy...
Let us see who can become the Wizard King!
No one can escape from here
Once again in the small closed off classroom
The star of the class was shining yet again
They shine so bright that I close my eyes
That the revolution was within my hands
If you want to laugh, go ahead and laugh
The rest of us who were left behind wanted to become something
We repeat the same morning over and over
You are the only one who can choose your tomorrow
Let us go beyond our current selves
Even though I cannot use magic, I am going to join the Magic Knights!
So that I can become the Wizard King!
Black Clover, Page 3: To the Royal Capital of the Clover Kingdom!
Page 3 To the Royal Capital of the Clover Kingdom!
Not giving up is my magic!
